name: Got Balls?
description:
A fun and rewarding endless runner/dodger made under 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam! Control Monsieur Corcle and try to either stay alive as long as possible or obtain as high a score as possible. I challenge you to do both! 

What makes this game different is that it directly challenges you to play better. You see, if you lose more than 5 times, you will find that the game c****s itself! 

Adherence to the theme: The game showcases 3 different forms of elements joining together: 

  1. The world is joined with your screen. If you move out of the screen, you will die as the world does not exist anymore.
  2. The player's stats are joined with the obstacles and the player's decisions. If you want to achieve a higher play time, avoid the obstacles. But if you want to obtain a higher score, pass between the obstacles without dying! I DARE YOU to get a score of above 50 along with a time of 50 or more seconds!
  3. The most prominent one - The fate of the game lies in your hands. It's directly joined with your skills. Die more than 5 times, and you're in for a surprise!

PLEASE DO LEAVE A COMMENT! ALL FEEDBACK IS APPRECIATED!
